channel.title: 11 on A Journey in Automating the Datacenter
channel.description: Recent content in 11 on A Journey in Automating the Datacenter

item.title: Automated Upgrade to Veeam v11
item.description: After the release of Veeam Backup & Replication v10 last year, I wrote a PowerShell script to automate the upgrade. It’s as easy as they come as it enabled one-click upgrades of Veeam environments. With the release of v11, I wanted to continue the tradition to enable those with multiple Veeam servers, the easy button for mass upgrades to the latest version of the product. I’m happy to announce the release of an updated version of this script for v11!

item.title: Ansible Update for Veeam v11
item.description: Veeam Backup & Replication v11 officially launched last week! With a new version of the product that is jam-packed with features, it’s no wonder that it’s already passed 15,000 unique downloads! Even before it was released, I was already being asked the question…when will the Veeam Collection for Ansible support v11? The answer is…right now! The collection now fully supports all major components of the Veeam Availablility Suite: Veeam Backup & Replication Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager Veeam ONE To the credit of the Veeam development team, there wasn’t much I had to do on my end for this.
